title: Season Rewards
body: I have not received my Platinum border for last season. Are they still sending them out?

replies.body: Hey, season rewards have rolled out!  I looked into this for you, but I don't really have great news to share.  :(  Feel free to hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we can share more context with your privately.  See you there!
